statements: SELECT * FROM demand_prediction;
SELECT predicted_demand, historical_demand FROM demand_prediction;
SELECT timestamp, predicted_demand, historical_demand FROM demand_prediction;
SELECT * FROM demand_prediction ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT historical_demand FROM demand_prediction WHERE predicted_demand > 100;
SELECT * FROM demand_prediction WHERE predicted_demand > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT predicted_demand, timestamp FROM demand_prediction WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY predicted_demand ASC
SELECT SUM(historical_demand) AS total_demand, AVG(predicted_demand) AS avg_prediction FROM demand_prediction WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2023-01-01'
SELECT timestamp, historical_demand, predicted_demand FROM demand_prediction USE INDEX (timestamp) WHERE historical_demand > 50 ORDER BY historical_demand DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT predicted_demand FROM demand_prediction WHERE predicted_demand IS NOT NULL ORDER BY predicted_demand DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM predictions WHERE predicted_demand > 100;
SELECT date, demand FROM historical_data WHERE demand BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT date, predicted_demand FROM predictions ORDER BY predicted_demand DESC NULLS LAST LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY demand ASC;
SELECT date, predicted_demand FROM predictions WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND predicted_demand BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT AVG(demand) AS average_demand, MAX(demand) AS max_demand FROM historical_data;
SELECT date, SUM(predicted_demand) AS total_predicted_demand FROM predictions GROUP BY date HAVING total_predicted_demand > 500;
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT timestamp, demand FROM historical_data WHERE demand > 100;
SELECT season, month, demand_factor FROM seasonal_data ORDER BY season DESC;
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_demand FROM future_demand_predictions WHERE predicted_demand < 500 ORDER BY prediction_date;
SELECT season, SUM(demand_factor) AS total_demand_factor FROM seasonal_data GROUP BY season;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT month, demand_factor FROM seasonal_data WHERE season='Summer' ORDER BY demand_factor DESC
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_demand FROM future_demand_predictions WHERE prediction_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT month, SUM(demand) AS total_demand FROM historical_data GROUP BY month ORDER BY total_demand DESC
SELECT * FROM seasonal_data WHERE season='Winter' AND month='December'
SELECT * FROM demand_predictions;
SELECT id, timestamp, demand_value FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100;
SELECT id, trend_value FROM trend_analysis ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT timestamp, demand_prediction FROM future_demand WHERE demand_prediction < 50;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM historical_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT id, timestamp, demand_value FROM demand_predictions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_value < 0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT timestamp, demand_prediction FROM future_demand WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM historical_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-06-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp < '2022-07-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_sales;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_details WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM location_details ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_value FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_value > 1000 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT date, temperature, precipitation FROM historical_weather WHERE temperature < 10 AND precipitation > 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_id, quantity, amount FROM historical_sales WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM product_details WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_value > 500 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT weather_id, date, temperature, precipitation FROM historical_weather WHERE temperature < 20 AND precipitation > 50 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_id, location_name, city, country FROM location_details WHERE city = 'New York' OR country = 'USA' ORDER BY location_name ASC;
